code:
-spec find_maximum_number(K :: integer(), X :: integer()) -> integer().
find_maximum_number(K, X) ->
    find_maximum_number(K, X, 1, K).

find_maximum_number(K, X, L, R) when L < R ->
    Mid = (L + R) div 2,
    Price = price_sum(Mid, X),
    if
        Price < K -> find_maximum_number(K, X, Mid + 1, R);
        Price > K -> find_maximum_number(K, X, L, Mid);
        true -> Mid
    end;
find_maximum_number(_, _, L, _) -> L - 1.

price_sum(Num, X) ->
    price_sum(Num, X, Num, 0).

price_sum(0, _, _, Acc) ->
    Acc;
price_sum(Num, X, Original, Acc) ->
    Bits = integer_to_list(Num, 2),
    Price = price(Bits, X, 1, 0),
    NewAcc = Acc + Price,
    if
        NewAcc >= Original -> Original;
        true -> price_sum(Num - 1, X, Original, NewAcc)
    end.

price([], _, _, Acc) ->
    Acc;
price([H|T], X, Index, Acc) ->
    NewAcc = case H == $1 andalso Index rem X == 0 of
        true -> Acc + 1;
        false -> Acc
    end,
    price(T, X, Index + 1, NewAcc).
